mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ARTICLE ( ARTICLE_ID, USER_NAME, TITLE, CONTENTS, LIKES_COUNT, READS_COUNT, WRITE_DATE ) VALUES ( ( SELECT MAX(A.ARTICLE_ID)+1 FROM ARTICLE A ), #{userName}, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, 0, CURDATE() )
mapper.select:
SELECT A.ARTICLE_ID articleId, A.USER_NAME userName, A.TITLE title, A.CONTENTS contents, A.LIKES_COUNT likesCount, A.READS_COUNT readsCount, A.WRITE_DATE writeDate FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RNUM , ART.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM ARTICLE
WHERE USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
WHERE CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY ARTICLE_ID DESC ) ART, ( SELECT @ROWNUM :=0 ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN #{startIndex} AND #{endIndex};
SELECT ARTICLE_ID articleId, USER_NAME userName, TITLE title, CONTENTS contents, LIKES_COUNT likesCount, READS_COUNT readsCount, WRITE_DATE writeDate FROM ARTICLE WHERE ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId}

SELECT COUNT(ARTICLE_ID) FROM ( SELECT ART.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM ARTICLE
WHERE USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
WHERE CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY ARTICLE_ID DESC ) ART ) A
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ARTICLE WHERE ARTICLE_ID = #{ articleId }
